original_solution_mapping.L1: If it takes on average 3 minutes to get dressed, then it takes 15 minutes total on the school week because 5 x 3 = <<15=15>>15
original_solution_mapping.L2: Thus far this week it has taken him 13 minutes to get dressed because 2 + 4 + 3 + 4 = <<13=13>>13

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2807.
    Returns: the time Osborn needs to get dressed on Friday to tie his old weekly average.
    """
    # L1
    old_average_time = 3 # 3 minutes on average to get dressed
    school_days_in_week = 5 # WK
    total_time_old_method = school_days_in_week * old_average_time

    # L2
    monday_time = 2 # 2 minutes
    tuesday_time = 4 # 4 minutes
    wednesday_time = 3 # 3 minutes
    thursday_time = 4 # 4 minutes
    current_week_total_time = monday_time + tuesday_time + wednesday_time + thursday_time

    # L3
    friday_time_needed = total_time_old_method - current_week_total_time

    # FA
    answer = friday_time_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If it takes on average {old_average_time} minutes to get dressed, then it takes {total_time_old_method} minutes total on the school week because {school_days_in_week} x {old_average_time} = <<{school_days_in_week}*{old_average_time}={total_time_old_method}>>{total_time_old_method}

Thus far this week it has taken him {current_week_total_time} minutes to get dressed because {monday_time} + {tuesday_time} + {wednesday_time} + {thursday_time} = <<{monday_time}+{tuesday_time}+{wednesday_time}+{thursday_time}={current_week_total_time}>>{current_week_total_time}

To tie his previous method, he needs to take {friday_time_needed} minutes on Friday because {total_time_old_method} - {current_week_total_time} = <<{total_time_old_method}-{current_week_total_time}={friday_time_needed}>>{friday_time_needed}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Thus far this week it has taken him 13 minutes to get dressed because 2 + 4 + 3 + 4 = <<2+4+3+4=13>>13
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: To tie his previous method, he needs to take 13 minutes on Friday because 15 - 2 = <<15-2=13>>13

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'monday_time' (value: 2) was used instead of 'current_week_total_time' (value: 13).
